technology: HTML, CSS3, Material Ui, Firebase, React js, React-router, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB
detailsOne: 1.It's a fully responsive website for selling themes, domains and hosting. By using the register page users can register by giving their name, email and password or using the google sign-in method. And Can login in future using the login page.
detailsTwo: 2.The home page has the 'Choose The Theme' area buyers can buy the theme by clicking 'Buy Now Button' and giving details information. The theme has some themes but if you click the 'see all theme' button website moved you to the theme page and you can see all themes.
detailsThree: 3.The home page have 'storage area'.Buyers can select any types of storage and can purchased. On theme page have all themes and buyers can purchased any theme.On domain page buyer can purchases domain ass his demand and showing below different types of domain price.After loging people can use deshboard page.Users can saw his purchased details from deshboard.
detailsFour: 4.On update info page admin can add, update and delete  theme, domain and hosting data. Only admin can able to add new admin after login. If you playing role as an admin please using this email  abc@gmail.com and password 123456.After admin login admin can saw all purchased data and can handle purchased details.
detailsFive: 5.Users can contact with authority by using Contact Us page and can send email by using contact page.

technology: HTML, CSS3, Material Ui, Firebase, React js, React-router, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB
detailsOne: 1.It's a fully responsive news portal website. By using the register page users can register by giving their name, email and password or using the google sign-in method. And Can login in future using the login page.
detailsTwo: 2.The home page has all types of updated news and the right sidebar has ads. Users can read all types of details news on the home page.
detailsThree: 3.Different type of page has different specific types of news and the right sidebar has ads. The Bangladesh page has Bangladeshi news. The sports page has sports news. etc
detailsFour: 4.Users can contact with authority by using contact page and can send email by using contact page.
detailsFive: 5.On  deshboard page admin can add, update and delete  news in different types of news in different areas. Only admin can able to use this page after login. If you playing role as an admin please using this email  abc@gmail.com and password 123456.

technology: HTML, CSS3, Material Ui, Firebase, React js, React-router, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB
detailsOne: 1.It's a fully responsive hospital management website. By using the register page users can register by giving their name, email and password or using the google sign-in method. And Can log in in future using the login page.
detailsTwo: 2.On the Home page have some hospital data about hospital information, doctor data, hospital service data etc.
detailsThree: 3.On the appointment page, users can take appointments on any date based on their requirements. There have a calendar user can choose a date on this calendar and take appointment on this date.
detailsFour: 4.Users can contact the author by using the contact page and can send emails by using the contact page.
detailsFive: 5.On the dashboard page, the admin can add, update and delete news in different types of news in different areas. Only the admin can able to use this page after login. If you playing a role as an admin please use this email  abc@gmail.com and password 123456.

detailsOne: 1. It's a fully responsive travel agency website design using HTML, CSS3, Bootstrap 5, Firebase, and React. User Can log in using email and password or the google sign-in method.
detailsTwo: 2. The Home page has a slider area, our services area, Popular Tours In This Year area and a footer area. On services, the area has our all services and a person can see details information there and there has a Booking button.
detailsThree: 3.On the booking page a person can book services and see booking information from a manage book page.
detailsFour: 4. The contact page has contact information.

detailsOne: It's a food shop base web page design by using HTML and CSS. There have a navbar, slide area, about details area and showing product in card.

detailsOne: 1.It's a search product web page fully responsive design using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5 and JavaScript.
detailsTwo: 2. There has a search bar after searching any product this type of product loads at the bottom and shows product data with image.
detailsThree: 3.If the customer wants to see details of product information needs to click the Details button on the card and show details on the top.
detailsFour: 4.If customers click the 'add to cart ' button product price is added Calculation Cart and shows their total product, price,  Delivery-Charge, Total-Tax and show the bottom total price.

detailsOne: It is a pin matcher made by HTML, CSS3 and JS.  Generate PIN button Click this button to generate PIN and type the PIN there.  After submit if pin match get message pin matched, if pin not match message get pin not matched please try again.
